Jargon Term: medications to maintain your blood pressure at a safe level
START pantoprazole 40 mg by mouth twice daily instead of omeprazole (Prilosec)
START clopidogrel (Plavix) 75 mg by mouth daily
STOP amlodipine until you are instructed to restart it by your PCP or cardiologist
STOP losartan until you are instructed to restart it by your PCP or cardiologist
STOP diltiazem until you are instructed to restart it by your PCP or cardiologist
